Product Collections Section.Layout: Single-column layout with centered text followed by a two-column grid of product cards.
Product Collections Section.Design: Modern and clean with a focus on showcasing products with high-quality images. The product cards have a hover effect for interactivity.

Key Elements.Section Header: Includes a bold, centered heading and a subheading for introductory text.
Key Elements.Product Cards: Each card features a high-resolution image with overlay text. The cards expand slightly on hover.
Key Elements.Overlay Text: Provides category and sub-category names with a gradient background for readability.
Key Elements.Grid Structure: Two-column layout for product cards at smaller screens, ensuring all products are displayed prominently.

Product Collections Section.Use Cases: Ideal for e-commerce websites to display featured products or collections, such as home decor, fashion, or electronics.
